selectLanguageCaption:
Configure your PetID, by selecting app language.
*If you understand this, you are on the right way*
selectThemeCaption:
Customize PetID app personally for you.
Use that theme, that you want!
welcomeCaption: Take care of your pet and never lose it! This application in conjunction with the brand Pet ID Tags will help you not to lose your beloved pet. Any passerby will be able to scan QR and get information from you and send the location of the last scan
getStartedCaption: You must create new account or login if you already used this app before
scanQrCaption: QR scanning will show data about pet, that attached to this QR
attachPetCaption: After first Pet ID Tag scan you be able to fill data about your lovely pet
maintenanceCheck: Checking PetID servers for maintenance break...

ooopsie.serviceUnavailableDescription: Oh, no! Servers are unavailable now due to some unknown error. Wait and try again later, I donâ€™t know when servers will available again. I only have paws... :(
ooopsie.noInternetDescription: Hey, you have to be connected to Wi-Fi or Cellular Data to be able to use PetID!
ooopsie.maintenanceDescription: We closed servers for a few seconds to improve their quality! Try again later, and we will a little better than before.
